Room.Name: Jungle Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a heavily overgrown trail leading through the Uland jungle.
Room.LongDescription: The path twists constantly and changes direction every few meters, but is generally taking a north-south direction. The path looks old, and will probably be fully overgrown by next year. Evidently no one travels this way any longer. The jungle is actually a rather noisy place, and birds overhead make a terrible racket. In the distance you hear growls and roars, and an agonizing scream.
